lines.text: New Orleans is a marvelous environment for coincidence.
Andre's afraid of the dark.
[as DeSoto drops various guns, knives, brass knuckles and assorted weapons on the table]
Uh uh, it's a jungle out there. If that don't work, I piss on 'em.
Sorry boys, but you know I have to pat everyone down.

[as DeSoto begins placing various weapons on the table]
Andre here scared of the dark!
Dark, Hell! It's a jungle out there...

[after emptying his pockets of three pistols, two knives, brass knuckles, a black-jack, and a baton]
If that don't work, I piss on 'em.
Just relax, darlin'. This is the Big Easy. Folks have a certain way o' doin' things down here.

[Anne and Remy are on the scene of a triple murder]
Why don't you believe that the killers were cops?

Because if they were cops, they would've stayed right here. And when we arrived, we would've found plants, guns, knives, all kinds of evidence that they resisted arrest. That's somethin' every cop in the world knows how to do.
That sure doesn't surprise me.
Oh yeah? Well, you probably know how to bribe a jury too, don't you?
[smiles wickedly]
Even though you probably never have, huh?
If I can't have you, can I have my gator?

You're a cop for God's sake, you're supposed to uphold the law, but instead you bend it and twist it and sell it. I saw you take that bribe and, and resist arrest and tamper with evidence and perjure yourself under oath.
Don't forget I ran a red light too, huh.
You still think it's funny, don't you? Why don't you just face it, Remy? You're not one of the good guys anymore.
Oh, man, now they're killing retards.
Then why ain't you dead?
That's OK. I never did have much luck with sex anyway.
Your luck's about to change, cher.
[repeated lines]
Sustained!
